settings.title: We have science on our side.
settings.text_content:
At Alimba, we use biomechanics and physics principles to design workouts that are effective and efficient, without excess stress on your joints. 

We are all about working smarter, not harder.

settings.title: What makes Alimba different?
settings.text: We think our program is pretty special. Check out this vid highlighting 3 features of Alimba that sets it apart from the other online fitness programs out there.

settings.heading: Hear from our community about how Alimba fits in with their life:

settings.text: I am loving Alimba. I love that all the thinking is done for me and I just turn up. I actually feel motivated to finish the last reps and get the most out of them.
After years of trying different forms of workouts that usually put unnecesary pressure on my joints and resulted in injuries, I am excited to have Alimba at my fingertips!
Alimba's raw and unedited content sets it apart from other platforms. It is a far more personal experience than what I have experienced with fitness apps in the past.
I really love Alimba! There are so many class options each week so I can pick something depending on my mood or how I am feeling that day.
Been doing Alimba for a few weeks now and loving the workouts. Having them all planned to just smash out is epic!
My partner & I love Alimba. It's not just for the ladies. New workouts every week makes keep it fresh. The trainers explain the movements really well, so it’s easy to follow.
As a working mum, Alimba makes exercise easy as my week is planned. As an engineer, I love the ‘physics’ approach, I’m too busy to waste time when there is a smarter way to workout.
This platform is amazing!! I love the workouts and education they provide. There are always modifications & they encourage you to listen to your body. 10/10 recommend!
Alimba has been a game changer for me while travelling. Easy setup & simple equipment, and I feel good afterwards. The first online workouts I can see myself doing long term.
As a 30 yr old carpenter, I found it hard and taxing on my body trying to get to the gym routinely. Alimba workouts help me feel strong as a carpenter. I have more time and it’s cheaper than the gym!
I’ve just finished my first Alimba workout and loved it. I’ve had multiple injuries throughout my life from Motorcross and I was able to get through the entire workout pain free!
I love how Alimba isolates specific muscle groups in class so I can really connect to them and feel them working. I don't feel completely exhausted after class and still have energy for my day.

Alimba feels like a personal training session. As I am getting stronger I am increasing my weights which is exciting! I am 62 - these workouts are suitable for any age as they are so easily adaptable.

Subheading
What does a typical week look like?
Each week consists of 5 unique workouts, strategically planned to minimise overuse and maximise effectiveness.

settings.title: Lower Body Lift
settings.text:
Our Lift classes are our signature classes and part of our core schedule.

Lift classes focus on building strength and muscle, using biomechanics principles to ensure the most effective work to the muscle, without having to use insanely heavy weights.

These classes are totally customisable depending on where you are at in your fitness journey, and what equipment you have on hand.

In Lower Body Lift, we are focusing on the glutes, quads and hammies. Big juicy muscle groups that will get your heart pumping.

Duration - approx. 30 minutes.

settings.title: Lower Body Lift
settings.text:
Our Lift classes are our signature classes and part of our core schedule.

Lift classes focus on building strength and muscle, using biomechanics principles to ensure the most effective work to the muscle, without having to use insanely heavy weights.

These classes are totally customisable depending on where you are at in your fitness journey, and what equipment you have on hand.

In Lower Body Lift, we are focusing on the glutes, quads and hammies. Big juicy muscle groups that will get your heart pumping.

Duration - approx. 30 minutes.

settings.title: Upper Body Lift
settings.text:
Our Lift classes are our signature classes and part of our core schedule.

Lift classes focus on building strength and muscle, using biomechanics principles to ensure the most effective work to the muscle, without having to use insanely heavy weights.

These classes are totally customisable depending on where you are at in your fitness journey, and what equipment you have on hand.

In Upper Body Lift, we are focusing on the arms, chest and back. Dumbbells are recommended for these classes, however there will often be no equipment options available.

Duration - approx. 30 minutes.

settings.title: Form
settings.text:
Our Form classes are mat-based classes, with a focus on core and back strength. Requiring little to no equipment, this class is the perfect mid week class to break things up. Don't be fooled - this does not mean it is easy! Get ready for those abs to be burning.

Duration - approx. 30 minutes.

settings.title: Move cardio
settings.text:
Our Move cardio class is a short, low-impact, high intensity class that will get your heart pumping (without making your body feel like it is falling apart).

There are a range of styles covered, from more dance-style cardio to shadow boxing, this class keeps things fresh.

This class is not part of our core schedule, and is totally optional depending on where you are at in your fitness journey. If you are experiencing a lot of stress, or are just moving across from a consistently high intensity program, we recommend dropping the cardio from your schedule, until you are feeling it.

Duration - approx. 15 minutes.

settings.title: Full Body Lift
settings.text:
Our Lift classes are our signature classes and part of our core schedule.

Lift classes focus on building strength and muscle, using biomechanics principles to ensure the most effective work to the muscle, without having to use insanely heavy weights.

These classes are totally customisable depending on where you are at in your fitness journey, and what equipment you have on hand.

In Full Body Lift, we hit select muscle groups each week across the whole body. We love ending the week with this satisfying class.

Duration - approx. 45 minutes.

settings.text: 5 unique workouts uploaded every week, strategically planned to minimise overuse and maximise effectiveness.

settings.title: What equipment do I need to get started?
settings.text:
There are a few pieces we recommend you add to your arsenal, to get the most out of your workouts.

These are:

  • Dumbbells. A set of light (1-3kg) medium (4-7kg) and heavy (7+kg) weights are ideal. If you are just starting out, you can definitely get away with a set of 5kg weights and a heavy water bottle (to use as your lighter weight). But as you start to progress, it is great to have some variation in your weight options.
  • Resistance bands. The long stretchy ones are the most versatile in our classes.
  • Small pilates ball.
  • A sturdy dining chair / bench.

Equipment is minimal (and as you will see in the suggested equipment swaps table here, there are always alternatives you can find in your house to start with).

More info on equipment can be found on our FAQs page here.

settings.title: I usually just pick random workouts from my online program, is that how this works?
settings.text:
Not exactly.

We have a schedule of 5 new classes every week, with suggested days for you to take each class. These classes have been specifically programmed to grow your muscles, without overuse.

Remember - Alimba is about building strength through consistency. If you chop and change around different classes, this can lead to overuse or even underuse of some muscle groups.

We recommend that you take the 4 strength training classes every week (with the cardio class being optional).

It may seem like a big change to how you currently work out, but once you get into the rhythm it makes working out a joy. All you have to do is show up and click play on that day's workout!

settings.title: What makes Alimba different?
settings.text:
At Alimba, we focus on building muscle, without overuse or compromising your joints. We use biomechanics and physics principles to ensure our workouts are effective and efficient.

There are no before and after photos, or 30 day shreds. Just consistent training that provides amazing results, for life.

settings.title: Are the classes / movements modifiable?
settings.text:
For sure - that is what we are all about! We like to make our classes fit our bodies (not the other way around).

In class, we will often cue alternative movements or modifications that you can take to make sure the movements are working for your body.

In our membership portal we also have a table of suggested movement swaps so you can still be hitting the right muscles in the way that suits you best.

Of course if you have any specific physical requirements, be sure to discuss these with your doctor or health care professional, before starting any new program.
